ideas.globals.title: Foreslog en idé
ideas.globals.ideas-disabled: Modulet **idé** er deaktiveret på denne server
ideas.confirm-modal.title: Idéen er godkendt!
ideas.confirm-view.title: Ideen er afvist!
ideas.idea-modal.label: Fortæl os om din idé
ideas.idea-modal.placeholder: Beskriv din idé så detaljeret som muligt med brugseksempler.
ideas.idea-modal.embed-description: Om ideen bliver godkendt eller ej afhænger af dig!
ideas.idea-view.timeout-message:
Du kan kun foreslå en idé én gang hvert 30. minut
Næste mulighed for at indsende en idé vil være gennem: <t:{time}:R>
ideas.init.title: Ideas
ideas.init.description:
Do you have a good idea?
And you are sure that everyone will like it!
Before you write it, make sure that there have been no such ideas yet!
ideas.idea-modal.image.label: Image url
ideas.idea-modal.image.placeholder: If you want, you can attach an image
ideas.mod.permission.ban:
You have limited access to creating ideas!
Exit Time: Forever
Moderator: {moderator}
Reason: `{reason}`
ideas.mod.permission.mute:
You have limited access to creating ideas!
Exit Time:  <t:{time:.0f}:f> ({display_time})
Moderator: {moderator.mention}
Reason: `{reason}`
ideas.mod.ban.title: Ban in ideas
ideas.mod.ban.already.description:
The {member.mention} ({member.id}) user is already banned
The moderator who issued the ban: {moderator.mention} ({moderator.id})
Reason: `{reason}`
ideas.mod.ban.success.description:
The blocked user: {member.mention} ({member.id})
The moderator who issued the ban: {moderator.mention} ({moderator.id})
Reason: `{reason}`
ideas.mod.unban.title: Unban in ideas
ideas.mod.unban.success.description:
An unblocked user: {member.mention} ({member.id})
The moderator who issued the unban: {moderator.mention} ({moderator.id})
Reason: `{reason}`
ideas.mod.mute.title: Mute in ideas
ideas.mod.mute.already.description:
The {member.mention} ({member.id}) user is already muted
The moderator who issued the mute: {moderator.mention} ({moderator.id})
Time of action: <t:{timestamp:.0f}:f> ({display_time})
Reason: `{reason}`
ideas.mod.mute.success.description:
The blocked user: {member.mention} ({member.id})
The moderator who issued the mute: {moderator.mention} ({moderator.id})
Time of action: <t:{timestamp:.0f}:f> ({display_time})
Reason: `{reason}`
ideas.mod.unmute.title: Unmute in ideas
ideas.mod.unmute.success.description:
An unblocked user: {member.mention} ({member.id})
The moderator who issued the unmute: {moderator.mention} ({moderator.id})
